default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Arresting someone without evidence? What a good dog you are. I must say, this tasteless dump really suits you.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Ugh, don't annoy me with matters unrelated to art.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Who cares about powerful illusions? They can never replace real paintbrushes.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: You need to keep up. I'm not going to wait for you if you fall behind.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: It is your honor to enjoy my feast for the senses.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: What a failure.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: How tacky! It must be destroyed!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Is beauty always fleeting?

default.title: Greeting
default.text: How are you planning to waste your worthless life today? Actually, there's no need to answer. I'm not interested. It was just a polite greeting on my part.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: When I got into that car accident, half the Eastside art world secretly cheered. Those crass imbeciles didn't realize that as a painter, I simply stole some of their business, but as a critic, I could destroy them completely.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: What's the difference between those mindless paintings and that useless head on your shoulders?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: There is no authoritative standard for artistic expression. It's delusional to think that a few million DisCoins can define the value of a work. These Eastside upstarts are even shallower than you.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Can I use your art forum account? I just wrote a review, but when I tried to post it, I discovered that my account had been banned.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Don't give up just because I always say you're worthless! You have merits too! For example, you're... um... you're kind!

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I'm the critic who has made the biggest contribution to improving the art world. How dare they call me a shrew? Fine. I'll be the shrew as long as my words can awaken those incompetent fools.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Upon closer inspection, your face is actually quite attractive.... what a pity, we met too late. No time to paint a portrait of you now.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Sigh! Turned out crooked again... My hand can't even draw a straight line anymore...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You are hopelessly tacky!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Unless you've suddenly become enlightened enough to discuss the role of color in the emotional expression of the painting Rebecca, don't bother me. I have several critiques to write, and I have no time to waste with you.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Just don't take me anywhere tacky.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Have you been waiting here all this time? Seems like the position of Chief is an idle job.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Thank you... why, is it weird for me to say thank you?

default.title: Join Team
default.text: These hideous things really disgust me. Let's get this over with.

trail_of_butterfly.title: Obtain Attire
trail_of_butterfly.text: Surprised to see me? It's nice and quiet here. I won't be disturbed. It's the perfect place for writing my critiques.

trail_of_butterfly.title: Level Up
trail_of_butterfly.text: Comment sent. Now, onto the next one...

trail_of_butterfly.title: Greeting
trail_of_butterfly.text: If you're not put off by my comments of you from head to toe, there's an empty chair over there for you.

trail_of_butterfly.title: Ordinary Contact 1
trail_of_butterfly.text: The cocoon has turned into a butterfly after a winter on the branch. The once-dead hyacinth is now budding again... So many miracles can happen in the greenhouse... What about in life?

trail_of_butterfly.title: Ordinary Contact 2
trail_of_butterfly.text: Ha, they call me jealous? Why should I be jealous of those speculators who know nothing other than marketing? All that publicity can't hide the fact that their works are trash.

trail_of_butterfly.title: Idle
trail_of_butterfly.text: I can see a hint of creativity here... but the use of colors is too boring... It can be bolder...

trail_of_butterfly.title: Annoyed
trail_of_butterfly.text: The plants here are in need of some fertilizer... I see you're quite the material for it, huh?

trail_of_butterfly.title: Special Attention
trail_of_butterfly.text: As the Chief, have you got nothing else to do besides staring at me? Go water the plants if you're so bored. The watering can is right there.
